trans-unit.source: Enter this code in your shopping cart to get your discount.
trans-unit.target: Untuk mendapatkan diskon, masukkan kode berikut saat berbelanja.

trans-unit.source: Your cart has been saved, you can resume your order by visiting our shop:
trans-unit.target: Keranjang belanja Anda telah disimpan, Anda dapat melanjutkan berbelanja dengan mengunjungi website kami di:

trans-unit.source: You are one of our best customers, however you have not placed an order in {days_threshold} days.
trans-unit.target: Anda adalah salah satu pelanggan terbaik kami, akan tetapi Anda belum melakukan pembelian selama {days_threshold} hari.

trans-unit.source: We wish to thank you for the trust you have placed in us and want to give you a discount of {amount}% valid on your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Sebagai bentuk terima kasih, kami memberikan diskon sejumlah {amount}% pada pembelian Anda selanjutnya! Penawaran ini berlaku selama {days} hari, jadi jangan sia-siakan kesempatan ini!

trans-unit.source: We have updated the progress on your return #{id_order_return}, the new status is:
trans-unit.target: Kami telah memperbaharui status retur #{id_order_return}, status barunya adalah:

trans-unit.source: You can review your order and download your invoice from the "Order history" section of your customer account by clicking "My account" on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Anda dapat melihat order dan mengunduh invoice dari "Riwayat pembelian" melalui akun pelanggan Anda yang dapat diakses dihalaman "Akun saya" diwebsite kami.

trans-unit.source: If you have a guest account, you can follow your order via the "Guest Tracking" section on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Jika Anda menggunakan guest account, Anda dapat memantau pembelian Anda melalui halaman "Guest Tracking" diwebsite kami.

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} has been modified.
trans-unit.target: Pesanan Anda dengan referensi {order_name} telah dimodifikasi.

trans-unit.source: Thanks for your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name}.
trans-unit.target: Terima kasih atas pembelian Anda dengan kode referensi {order_name} di {shop_name}.

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, one or more items are currently out of stock. This may cause a slight delay in your delivery. Please accept our apologies and rest assured that we are working hard to rectify this.
trans-unit.target: Mohon maaf, satu atau beberapa produk kami saat ini habis stoknya, jadi akan ada keterlambatan dalam hal pengiriman. Jika telah tersedia, akan kami informasikan secepatnya.

trans-unit.source: A new order has been generated on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: Order baru telah dibuat untuk Anda.

trans-unit.source: Please go on {order_link} to finalize the payment.
trans-unit.target: Harap kunjungi {order_link} untuk menyelesaikan proses pembayaran.

trans-unit.source: A new order was placed on {shop_name} by the following customer: {firstname} {lastname} ({email})
Your message has been sent successfully.
We will answer as soon as possible.
Here is your personal login information for {shop_name}:
trans-unit.target: Berikut adalah informasi login Anda di {shop_name}:

trans-unit.source: Regarding your newsletter subscription, we are pleased to offer you the following voucher:
trans-unit.target: Karena telah berlangganan newsletter, kami dengan senang hati menawarkan voucher berikut:

trans-unit.source: You have received a new message regarding order with the reference
trans-unit.target: Anda menerima pesan yang terkait dengan penjualan dengan kode referensi

trans-unit.source: You have received a new return request for {shop_name}.
trans-unit.target: Anda telah menerima permintaan pengembalian baru untuk {shop_name}.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for creating a customer account at {shop_name}.
trans-unit.target: Terima kasih telah menjadi pelanggan di {shop_name}.

trans-unit.source: Always keep your account details safe.
Never disclose your login details to anyone.
trans-unit.target: Jangan bagikan informasi login Anda ke orang lain.

trans-unit.source: Should you suspect someone is using your account illegally, please notify us immediately.
trans-unit.target: Jika Anda curiga akun Anda digunakan orang lain, hubungi kami secepatnya.

trans-unit.source: You can now place orders on our shop:
trans-unit.target: Sekarang Anda dapat berbelanja di toko kami:

trans-unit.source: We noticed that during your last visit on {shop_name}, you did not complete the order you had started.
trans-unit.target: Berdasarkan catatan pada kunjungan terakhir Anda di {shop_name}, Anda tidak menyelesaikan proses pembelian yang Anda buat.

trans-unit.source: As an incentive, we can give you a discount of {amount}% off your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Sebagai insentif, kami memberikan diskon sejumlah {amount}% yang dapat Anda gunakan pada pembelian selanjutnya! Penawaran ini berlaku sampai {days} hari, jadi jangan sia-sia kan kesempatan ini!

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name} has been changed by the merchant.
trans-unit.target: Status pembelian Anda dengan kode referensi {order_name} di {shop_name} telah diubah.

trans-unit.source: We have processed your {shop_name} refund for order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Proses refund Anda di {shop_name} untuk pembelian dengan kode referensi {order_name} sedang kami proses.

trans-unit.source: A voucher has been created in your name as a result of your order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Voucher telah dibuatkan bagi Anda karena telah melakukan pembelian dengan kode referensi {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: Simply copy/paste this code during the payment process for your next order.
trans-unit.target: Cukup copy/paste kode berikut pada saat proses pembayaran di pembelian Anda selanjutnya.

trans-unit.source: Here is the code of your voucher:
We have created a voucher in your name for referring a friend.
trans-unit.target: Kami telah membuat voucher atas nama Anda karena telah merujuk teman Anda ke website kami.

trans-unit.source: Your guest account for {shop_name} has been transformed into a customer account.
trans-unit.target: Guest account Anda di {shop_name} telah diubah menjadi akun pelanggan.

trans-unit.source: Please be careful when sharing these login details with others.
trans-unit.target: Harap berhati-hati jika membagi informasi login berikut dengan orang lain.

trans-unit.source: You can access your customer account on our shop:
trans-unit.target: Anda dapat mengakses akun Anda di toko kami:

trans-unit.source: We have generated a credit slip in your name for order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Kami telah membuat nota kredit atas nama Anda untuk pembelian dengan kode referensi {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: You can review this credit slip and download your invoice from the "My credit slips" section of your account by clicking "My account" on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Anda dapat melihat nota kredit dan mengunduh invoicenya dari "Nota kredit" di halaman akun yang dapat diakses melalui menu "Akun saya" diwebsite kami.

trans-unit.source: You have received a new message from {shop_name} regarding order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Anda menerima pesan dari {shop_name} terkait dengan pembelian dengan kode referensi {order_name}.

trans-unit.source: Please do not reply directly to this email, we will not receive it.
trans-unit.target: Jangan balas email ini, karena tidak akan kami terima.

trans-unit.source: In order to reply, please use the following link: {link}
trans-unit.target: Untuk membalas, gunakan tautan berikut: {link}

trans-unit.source: We are currently processing your {shop_name} order with the reference {order_name}.
trans-unit.target: Pembelian Anda di {shop_name} dengan kode referensi {order_name} sedang kami proses.

trans-unit.source: This is to inform you about the creation of a voucher.
trans-unit.target: Untuk menginformasikan Anda tentang pembuatan voucher.

trans-unit.source: You have selected to pay by wire transfer.
trans-unit.target: Anda memilih untuk membayar melalui transfer bank.

trans-unit.source: Here are the bank details for your transfer:
Please specify your order reference in the bankwire description.
trans-unit.target: Cantumkan referensi pesanan di dalam uraian transfer bank.

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} has been placed successfully and will be shipped as soon as we receive your payment.
trans-unit.target: Pembelian Anda dengan kode referensi {order_name} berhasil diproses dan akan kami kirim segera setelah pembayaran diterima.

trans-unit.source: If you have a guest account, you can follow your order via the "Guest Tracking" section on our shop.
trans-unit.target: Jika Anda memiliki guest account, Anda dapat memantau order Anda via "Guest Tracking" diwebsite kami.

trans-unit.source: You have selected to pay by check.
trans-unit.target: Anda memilih untuk melakukan pembayaran menggunakan cek.

trans-unit.source: Here are the bank details for your check:

This is a test e-mail from your shop.

If you can read this, the test was successful!
trans-unit.target:
Ini adalah tes email dari toko Anda.

Jika sampai berarti tesnya berhasil!

trans-unit.source: Your payment for order with the reference {order_name} was successfully processed.
trans-unit.target: Pembayaran untuk pembelian dengan kode referensi {order_name} berhasil diterima.

trans-unit.source: The file {filename} has been successfully imported to your shop.
trans-unit.target: File {filename} berhasil diimpor ke toko Anda.

trans-unit.source: You have requested to reset your {shop_name} login details.
trans-unit.target: Anda telah meminta untuk melakukan reset login Anda di {shop_name}.

trans-unit.source: Please note that this will change your current password.
trans-unit.target: Harap dicatat bahwa tindakan ini akan merubah password Anda.

trans-unit.source: To confirm this action, please use the following link:
trans-unit.target: Untuk konfirmasi, silahkan gunakan tautan berikut:

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} is currently in transit.
trans-unit.target: Pembelian Anda dengan kode referensi {order_name} sedang dalam perjalanan.

trans-unit.source: You can track your package using the following link:
trans-unit.target: Anda dapat melacak paket Anda menggunakan link berikut:

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} has been shipped.
trans-unit.target: Pembelian Anda dengan kode referensi {order_name} telah kami kirim.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name}
trans-unit.target: Terima kasih atas pembelian Anda dengan kode referensi {order_name} di {shop_name}

trans-unit.source: You have {nbProducts} product(s) now available for download using the following link(s):
trans-unit.target: Terdapat {nbProducts} produk yang dapat Anda unduh melalui tautan berikut ini:

trans-unit.source: You have received a new log alert
Warning: you have received a new log alert in your Back Office.
trans-unit.target: Perhatian: Anda menerima log alert baru di Back Office.

trans-unit.source: You can check for it in the "Tools" > "Logs" section of your Back Office.
trans-unit.target: Anda dapat mengkasesnya melalui menu "Tools" > "Logs" di Back Office.

trans-unit.source: {employee} wanted to forward this discussion to you.
trans-unit.target: {employee} ingin meneruskan diskusi ini kepada Anda.

trans-unit.source: The remaining stock is now less than the specified minimum of
trans-unit.target: Jumlah stok yang tersedia kurang dari yang telah ditentukan sebanyak

trans-unit.source: You are advised to open the product's admin Product Page in order to replenish your inventory.
trans-unit.target: Anda disarankan untuk melihat halaman admin produk untuk memperbaharui stok barang Anda.

trans-unit.source: Your order with the reference {order_name} from {shop_name} has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: Pembelian Anda dengan kode referensi {order_name} di {shop_name} telah dibatalkan.

trans-unit.source: There is a problem with your payment for {shop_name} order with the reference {order_name}. Please contact us at your earliest convenience.
trans-unit.target: Ada masalah terkait pembayaran Anda di {shop_name} untuk pembelian dengan kode referensi {order_name}. Harap hubungi kami secepatnya.

trans-unit.source: We cannot ship your order until we receive your payment.
trans-unit.target: Barang akan dikirim segera setelah pembayaran kami terima.

trans-unit.source: Your friend {firstname} {lastname} wants to refer you on {shop_name}!
trans-unit.target: Teman Anda {firstname} {lastname} ingin merekomendasikan Anda ke {shop_name}!

trans-unit.source: We are pleased to offer you a voucher worth {discount} that you can use on your next order.
trans-unit.target: Sebagai bentuk apresiasi, kami memberikan Anda voucher senilai {discount} yang dapat Anda digunakan untuk pembelian selanjutnya.

trans-unit.source: Get referred and earn a discount voucher of {discount}!
trans-unit.target: Jadi referer dan dapatkan voucher dison {discount}!

trans-unit.source: It's very easy to sign up. Just click here!
trans-unit.target: It's proses pendaftaran sangat mudah. Cukup klik disini!

trans-unit.source: When signing up, don't forget to provide the e-mail address of your referring friend:
trans-unit.target: Ketika mendaftar, jangan lupa untuk menyertakan alamat email teman yang mereferensikan Anda:

trans-unit.source: Your referred friend {sponsored_firstname} {sponsored_lastname} has placed his or her first order on {shop_name}!
trans-unit.target: Teman yang Anda referensikan {sponsored_firstname} {sponsored_lastname} telah berbelanja di {shop_name}!

trans-unit.source: We are pleased to offer you a voucher worth {discount_display} (voucher # {discount_name}) that you can use on your next order.
trans-unit.target: Kami menawarkan Anda diskon sejumlah {discount_display} (voucher # {discount_name}) yang dapat Anda gunakan pada pembelian selanjutnya.

trans-unit.source: The stock cover is now less than the specified minimum of:
trans-unit.target: Posisi stok saat ini kurang dari jumlah minimumyang telah ditentukan sejumlah:

trans-unit.source: This item is once again in-stock.
trans-unit.target: Stok untuk produk ini telah tersedia.

trans-unit.source: You can access the product page by clicking on the link:
trans-unit.target: Anda dapat mengakses halaman produk dengan klik link berikut:

trans-unit.source: You can order it right now from our online shop.
trans-unit.target: Anda dapat memesan saat ini juga dari toko kami.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your order at {shop_name}.
As our way of saying thanks, we want to give you a discount of {amount}% off your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Sebagai bentuk terima kasih, Kami memberikan diskon sejumlah {amount}% pada pembelian Anda selanjutnya! Penawaran ini berlaku selama {days} hari, jadi jangan sia-siakan kesempatan ini!

trans-unit.source: You are one of our best customers and as such we want to thank you for your continued patronage.
trans-unit.target: Terima kasih karena telah menjadi pelanggan terbaik kami.

trans-unit.source: As appreciation for your loyalty, we want to give you a discount of {amount}% valid on your next order! This offer is valid for {days} days, so do not waste a moment!
trans-unit.target: Sebagai bentuk penghargaan atas kesetiaan Anda, kami memberikan diskon sejumlah {amount}% pada pembelian Anda selanjutnya! Penawaran ini berlaku selama {days} hari, jadi jangan sia-siakan kesempatan ini!

trans-unit.source: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter.
trans-unit.target: Terima kasih telah berlangganan newsletter kami.

trans-unit.source: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter, please confirm your request by clicking the link below :
trans-unit.target: Terima kasih telah berlangganan newsletter, silahkan konfirmasi dengan klik pada tautan berikut :
